dict.acceptation: 上诉；[体育]诉请；呼吁；（迫切的）要求（帮助、同情等）恳求；
（迫切）要求；有吸引力；求助（于）；提请注意；

sent.orig: Article 50 appeal decisions Appeal Committee shall be jointly made by three Commissioners Appeal Committee.
sent.trans: 第50条（覆议委员会之审议决定）覆议委员会之审议决定，由三人合议行之。

sent.orig: The Appeal Court rejiected the appeal on a tenchnicality.
sent.trans: 上诉法院驳回了就技术细节问题的上诉。

sent.orig: The appeal statement should specify the grounds of the appeal.
sent.trans: 诉状中应该说明上诉的理由。

sent.orig: He lost an appeal against conviction at the Court of Appeal in July.
sent.trans: 他七月份在地区法院上诉失败了。

sent.orig: Appeal: No appeal accepted. The decisions of the referee the spot will be final.
sent.trans: 上诉：大会不设上诉，一切赛果以当场裁判员的决定为准。
